news.title: Arrest made after two killed in quadruple stabbing
news.summary: A man, aged 31, is arrested following the stabbing deaths of two people in south-east London.

news.title: Ozzy Osbourne's hearse to travel through home city Birmingham for fan procession
news.summary: Fans will get a chance to say farewell to the legendary Black Sabbath frontman, his family says.

news.title: Police officer among four dead in shooting at New York City office building
news.summary: Authorities say Shane Devon Tamura travelled across the country from Las Vegas to open fire inside the skyscraper.

news.title: Farage demands apology after minister says he is 'on the side of people like Jimmy Savile'
news.summary: Minister Peter Kyle claims that by opposing online safety laws the Reform UK leader is siding with sex offenders.

news.title: Rising meat and tea costs drive up food prices
news.summary: Food prices rose by 4% in the year to July, according to the British Retail Consortium.

news.title: Google launches new AI search feature in UK
news.summary: The new tool marks a significant change for the search giant but raises questions for advertisers.

news.title: Beijing floods kill 30 as China sees summer of extreme weather
news.summary: President Xi Jinping called for "all-out" rescue efforts and preparation for "worst-case" scenarios.

news.title: EE to launch phone plans which restrict internet for teens
news.summary: UK mobile network operators are already required to ensure only adults can access adult content while using their network.

news.title: 'So terrifying' - New Yorkers describe scrambling for cover in rush-hour skyscraper shooting
news.summary: Nearby workers fled and took cover after gunfire broke out in one of the city's busiest areas.

news.title: Watch: BBC visits Beijing region hit by deadly flood
news.summary: The BBC's Stephen McDonell is in Miyun, one of the areas hardest-hit by the severe weather.
